results.description: Combine recent change in the momentum style loading with cross-sectional z-scoring to capture short-term continuation in factor exposures. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using multiple operators on one high-coverage datafield. SUGGESTION2 not applied because no vector-type field identified. SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage=1.0). SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing a high userCount factor (rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum). Kept implementation short and within operator/datafield limits. Confidence set to 0.70 based on widespread use of the factor.

Bet on reversal of idiosyncratic moves by taking negative recent specific returns and normalizing cross-sectionally. Used daily_specific_return (high userCount). SUGGESTION1 used multiple operators; SUGGESTION2 not applicable; SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage=1.0). Chose high userCount field per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.65.

Short stocks with high hedge fund ownership percent and long low ownership to exploit crowding unwinds. Used hedge_fund_ownership_percent (very high userCount). Applied SUGGESTION1 with scaling and zscore. No vector fields; coverage=1.0 so ts_backfill unused. Confidence 0.72 due to large user/alpha presence.

Buy stocks where sentiment loading increases recently and rank cross-sectionally. Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt with ts_delta and quantile. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. No vec usage. Coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: high userCount gives confidence. Confidence 0.68.

Long names with rising short interest factor score (indicative of potential squeeze) after strong positive returns in momentum factor. Combined short_interest_factor_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 (two datafields). No vector fields. Coverage 1.0 so no ts_backfill. Used high userCount fields where possible. Confidence 0.62.

Capture momentum while neutralizing size by dividing momentum change by market cap. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION1 used two datafields; SUGGESTION4 favors momentum and cap. No vec or backfill applied. Confidence 0.66.

Favor stocks with positive momentum but low residual volatility to reduce crash risk. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 used two datafields; no vec/backfill needed. Selected high userCount fields per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.69.

Long stocks where value loading increases while momentum loading lags, betting on value catch-up. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 with two datafields. Coverage high. Confidence 0.60.

Exploit one-day reversal style by taking sign opposite to strong recent 1-day reversal loading. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_1drevrsl. SUGGESTION1 used single field with sign and zscore. High userCount factor increases confidence. Confidence 0.64.

Use industry daily specific returns (specret) to identify names that are outperforming their industry with expectation of reversion. Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_htcri (high userCount). SUGGESTION1 used ts_zscore on that field. No vec/backfill. Confidence 0.63.

Capitalize on prospect-style specific returns momentum using prospect_specret_daily. Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily and ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied with a well-covered field; ts_backfill not needed. Confidence 0.61.

Long names with sudden declines in earnings quality loading expecting reversion, normalized cross-sectionally. Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty (coverage slightly <1 but >0.95). SUGGESTION3 considered but not used because coverage>0.6. SUGGESTION4 used high userCount. Confidence 0.58.

Long stocks where growth loading rises and value loading falls, betting on growth outperformance in rotation regimes. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_growth and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value. Two datafields used per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.55.

Short names with high hedge fund ownership and low profit loading (crowded low-quality shorts). Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit. Applied SUGGESTION1 and used high userCount ownership. Confidence 0.67.
Short names with recent spikes in residual volatility expecting reversion. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol with ts_zscore. SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION4 used mid-high userCount. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Specific-return momentum damped by specific risk
results.description: Favor stocks with rising daily_specific_return but penalize by specific risk variance to reduce tail risk. Uses daily_specific_return and specific_risk_variance. Followed SUGGESTION1 with two fields. Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence 0.70.

Short names where short interest factor surged but daily_specific_return fell — signal for continued pressure. Uses short_interest_factor_score and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.53.

Long stocks where sentiment loading increased and residual volatility stayed low, indicating clean positive sentiment moves. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Exploit short-term mean reversion in prospect specific returns by taking negative recent average. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily and ts_mean. SUGGESTION1 satisfied. Confidence 0.60.

Long small-cap stocks with strong value loading to harvest value small-cap premium. Uses current_market_cap_usd and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value. Applied SUGGESTION1 and scaled value by inverse market cap. Confidence 0.64.

Long stocks with increasing hedge fund ownership percent over short window, normalized cross-sectionally. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent with ts_delta and quantile. SUGGESTION1 used single field with time operator. Confidence 0.66.

Short stocks that had strong positive daily_specific_return but high specific_risk_uncertainty to avoid catching falling knives. Uses daily_specific_return and specific_risk_uncertainty. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Favor momentum in names with low short interest (less prone to squeezes). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and short_interest_factor_score. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

Long stocks in industries where industry-specific specret shows rising trend vs peers. Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi and ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 used single industry-specific field. Confidence 0.61.

Short large-cap stocks heavily held by hedge funds with low profit loading. Uses current_market_cap_usd, hedge_fund_ownership_percent, rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit (two-field limit — combine ownership and profit only). Applied SUGGESTION1 and limited to two datafields by using ownership and profit (excluded cap to respect 2 field limit). Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Short-term reversal scaled by specific risk
results.description: Exploit short-term reversal in 1d reversal factor but discount names with high specific risk variance. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_1drevrsl and specific_risk_variance. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

Strengthen momentum where hedge funds are increasing ownership (confirming flows). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and ts_delta(hedge_fund_ownership_percent). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.67.
Long low value-loading stocks (cheap) but only where sentiment turned positive recently. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.58.

Short names where short interest and short-term momentum both rise (momentum driven by negative flows). Uses short_interest_factor_score and ts_delta(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

Compute information ratio of daily specific returns to find names with steady positive idiosyncratic performance. Uses ts_ir on daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 used one high-coverage field and ts_ir operator. Confidence 0.69.
Boost stock momentum when its industry's specret is also positive, using rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.60.

Short large caps where sentiment surged but momentum declines — fade sentiment spikes in big names. Uses current_market_cap_usd and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.52.
Long stocks with rising profit loading and low specific risk variance. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit and specific_risk_variance. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

Short names that show high sentiment loading but negative daily_specific_return, anticipating sentiment overshoot. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.56.
Long names where earnings-yield style loading improves sharply, normalized cross-sectionally. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild and ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Exploit long-term reversal loading by taking positions opposite to extreme long-term reversal z-scores. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_ltrevrsl. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

Capture stocks exhibiting strong seasonal loading increases over recent window. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_season with ts_delta. Coverage ~0.84 (still >0.6) so ts_backfill not used. SUGGESTION4 considered coverage. Confidence 0.50.
Long names where short interest factor drops quickly (covering), normalized cross-sectionally. Uses short_interest_factor_score and ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

Long names in semiconductor sectors showing rising exposure scores (semiconductors and equipment). Uses semiconductors_exposure_score and semiconductor_equipment_exposure_score. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Homebuilding momentum with earnings quality filter
results.description: Long homebuilding exposure increases but require stable earnings quality. Uses homebuilding_exposure_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty. SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage of earnqlty ~0.95 acceptable. Confidence 0.55.
Long gas utilities exposure when residual volatility low to capture yield-like stability. Uses gas_utilities_exposure_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Net-retail momentum with low hedge ownership
results.description: Prioritize net retail momentum where hedge fund ownership is low (uncrowded). Uses net_retail_exposure_score and hedge_fund_ownership_percent (two fields). SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Short large spike in specific returns
results.description: Short names with unusually large daily_specific_return z-scores (overreaction). Uses daily_specific_return with zscore and tail to cap extremes. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Long momentum only if prospect specific returns are also positive (confirmation). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Reduce momentum exposure for names with rising short interest; uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and ts_delta(short_interest_factor_score). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Long names where industry specret outperforms market factor loading. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Short overbought sentiment with low profit
results.description: Short names with high sentiment loading but low profit loading (overhyped). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.
Favor prospect momentum especially in smaller caps by dividing by market cap. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Use ts_rank over short window on momentum loading and take top quantile. Uses ts_rank and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.

Avoid names with fat-tailed idiosyncratic returns by penalizing high kurtosis in daily_specific_return. Uses ts_kurtosis(daily_specific_return, d). SUGGESTION1 used single field with ts_kurtosis. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Momentum x low specific risk uncertainty
results.description: Amplify momentum for names with low specific risk uncertainty. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and specific_risk_uncertainty. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

Long improving value loading and short deteriorating value loading to capture cross-sectional rotations. Uses ts_delta on rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value (single field but cross-sectionally ranked). SUGGESTION1 used one field with quantile. Confidence 0.58.

Short names with high hedge_fund_ownership_percent and very high recent daily_specific_return (crowded winners). Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

Rank daily_specific_return divided by residual volatility to find high risk-adjusted idiosyncratic winners. Uses daily_specific_return and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68.

Go long industries with rising exposure and short those with falling exposure using two exposure fields (e.g., consumer_electronics_exposure_score vs apparel_industry_exposure_score). SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.49.
Use winsorized daily_specific_return momentum to reduce outlier influence. Uses daily_specific_return with winsorize and ts_delta. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.
Short names with sudden spikes in residual volatility (high ts_zscore). Uses ts_zscore on rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Short names where sentiment is high but earnings-quality loading drops (overhyped weak earners). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

Short names where price factor reached local maximum in short window (ts_arg_max on momentum) expecting reversion. Uses ts_arg_max with rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.
Select names with high information ratio in prospect specific returns to find consistent idiosyncratic winners. Uses ts_ir on prospect_specret_daily. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Short momentum where industry profit loading is falling. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Use ts_returns of momentum loading to detect persistent momentum increases. Uses ts_returns with rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Short names where both short interest and hedge fund ownership rose rapidly (crowded shorts). Uses short_interest_factor_score and hedge_fund_ownership_percent. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Long value-loading increases specifically in midcap names (use midcap style loading). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_midcap. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Use ts_av_diff to find names far above recent mean in momentum loading and reverse them. Uses ts_av_diff with rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Favor high profit-loading small caps by dividing profit by market cap. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

Short stocks where both industry exposure and sentiment are extreme positive (overbought). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_htcri and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Momentum x low specific risk variance
results.description: Long momentum but penalize names with high specific risk variance. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and specific_risk_variance. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

Find names with product of several short-term indicators negative (eg, momentum down and sentiment down) using ts_product on two fields — we keep to one operator and two fields by multiplying zscores. SUGGESTION1 applied (two fields). Confidence 0.48.
Buy names that are at local minima in momentum (ts_arg_min) expecting bounce. Uses ts_arg_min on rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Select names with high daily_specific_return IR but low residual volatility. Uses ts_ir(daily_specific_return) and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.
Apply short-term momentum but smooth via hump to limit turnover; use hump on momentum loading. Uses hump and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Hedge-fund percent scaled by industry profit
results.description: Short names with high hedge fund ownership in industries where profit loading declines. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Momentum signal on momentum loading after subtracting market loading to hedge market moves. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. Confidence 0.63.
Take extreme quantiles of recent daily_specific_return (top and bottom) for long/short. Uses ts_quantile(daily_specific_return, d). SUGGESTION1 used single high-coverage field. Confidence 0.64.
Short names with high short interest but rising sentiment (contradiction) expecting unwind. Uses short_interest_factor_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.51.
Winsorize prospect specret then take momentum signal to reduce influence of outliers. Uses winsorize and ts_delta on rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Long value but penalize high leverage names by dividing by leverage style loading. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_leverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

Avoid names with high covariance between specific return and market by penalizing ts_covariance(daily_specific_return, market). Uses ts_covariance with daily_specific_return and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.53.
Use regional momentum loading as confirmation for momentum trades. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_regmom. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Short names with extreme specific_risk_variance z-scores as they may experience large idiosyncratic moves. Uses specific_risk_variance. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.49.
Apply linear decay smoothing to momentum loading to emphasize recent changes while limiting turnover. Uses ts_decay_linear and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Short names where hedge_fund_ownership_percent spikes rapidly (flow-driven squeezes reverse). Uses ts_delta on hedge_fund_ownership_percent. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Long names with rising profit loading and rising sentiment while short the opposite. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion on specret daily
results.description: Take opposite sign of short-window average of specret daily to exploit quick reversals. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_htcri with ts_mean. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.
Short names where short interest rises with sudden momentum up (anticipate negative flow). Uses short_interest_factor_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.52.
Compute IR of value loading changes to find consistent value improvers. Uses ts_ir on ts_delta(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Pair long top momentum ranks vs short bottom ranks using ts_rank on momentum loading. Uses ts_rank with rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.
Long names where sentiment loading rises relative to market loading. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Short hedge-fund crowded, high specific risk
results.description: Short names with both high hedge fund ownership and high specific_risk_uncertainty (crowded & risky). Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and specific_risk_uncertainty. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Long names with persistently high earnings-yield loading (value carry). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild with ts_mean. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by inverse short interest
results.description: Favor momentum more where short interest is low by multiplying momentum zscore by reverse short interest zscore. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and short_interest_factor_score. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.
Select names with steadily positive daily_specific_return using ts_count_nans and ts_mean to ensure consistency. Uses ts_mean(daily_specific_return, d). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

Long names where hedge_fund_ownership_percent rises and daily_specific_return also rises (positive flow-confirmed alpha). Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.68.
Short names with extremely high short-term sentiment zscore (mean-reversion). Uses ts_zscore on rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.
Long low-residual-volatility names scaled by positive profit loading. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

Short names that are a maximal distance above their recent max in momentum loading (ts_max_diff) expecting pullback. Uses ts_max_diff(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum, d). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56.
Long names with strong value loading and improving earnings quality. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

Short names with rising correlation between their specific return and a busy industry specret (ts_corr). Uses ts_corr(daily_specific_return, rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi, d). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.50.

Prefer names with strong momentum but low stddev of momentum loading (stable trend). Uses ts_delta(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum, d) and ts_std_dev. To keep two datafields, use ts_std_dev on same field. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.
Short names where hedge_fund_ownership_percent falls fast after being high (capitulation). Uses ts_delta on hedge_fund_ownership_percent with reverse. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.
Long momentum but only for names with decreasing short interest (covering). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and ts_delta(short_interest_factor_score). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.
Select names with high information ratio in profit loading changes to find consistent earners. Uses ts_ir(ts_delta(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_profit, d), 63). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.58.
Long momentum but divide by sqrt(specific_risk_variance) to damp high specific risk. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and specific_risk_variance. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65.
Short names with extremely high hedge_fund_ownership_percent z-scores (crowded). Uses zscore on hedge_fund_ownership_percent. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.
